name: Coin Hero
description:
My first University project and also the first game I created using the S2D frame work which was developed by my University. Coin Hero is a Pacman inspired game with similar mechanics. Most of the sprites used were created by Pipoya, I will leave a link to Pipoya's profile at the end of the description with the exception of the sword and coins which were self created.

Hope you enjoy the game.

Controls

  • Use the WASD keys to move around
  • Press Esc to pause
  • On the main menu press C for manual and instructions

Aim

  • Collect as many coins as you can
  • Get the weapons to be able to kill enemies
  • Avoid enemies if you haven't picked up a weapon
  • Get to the end of the level by reaching the ladder

Sprites by

https://itch.io/profile/pipoya
